Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is reportedly hoping to add £200m worth of new talent to his squad ahead of next season.
The Citizens became the first side in a decade to retain the Premier League title this season and they could become the first English club ever to win a clean sweep of major domestic honours should they beat Watford in Saturday's FA Cup final.

According to the Daily Mail, plans are already in place for the summer transfer window as Guardiola does not want to rest on his laurels.

As part of his freshening-up project, it is claimed that two new midfielders, a striker and a centre-back have been targeted.

Atletico Madrid ace Rodri and Eintracht Frankfurt striker Luka Jovic, valued at £60m and £50m respectively, are believed to be among those on City's radar.

Guardiola will balance his squad by getting rid of players, too, with Nicolas Otamendi, Fabian Delph and Eliaquim Mangala all supposedly facing uncertain futures at the Etihad Stadium.

The priorities are a 'number six' and a left-sided central defender.

Atletico Madrid's Spanish holding midfielder Rodri, 22, is among those being considered for the 'number six' role.

The aim of that signing is to produce an eventual successor to 34-year-old Fernandinho. City will not be signing Sporting Lisbon's Bruno Fernandes.

With Vincent Kompany's future uncertain, they also want a left-sided central defender.

One player City are certainly keen on is Crystal Palace's 21-year-old right-back Aaron Wan-Bissaka. I'm told they'll face a straight battle with Manchester United and despite preferring to stay in London, he wouldn't be averse to moving north.

City have shown interest in Leicester left-back Ben Chilwell, 22, and Fulham's 18-year-old winger Ryan Sessegnon. But the form of Oleksandr Zinchenko - allied to the problems they would face selling the injury-prone Benjamin Mendy - mean that interest has cooled.

Contract talks were held last summer with Germany midfielder Ilkay Gundogan, however no agreement was reached. And when City approached him again in January, he asked to postpone negotiations until the end of the season. It is understood he is likely to stay, even if he goes into the final year of his contract.

Another player City like is Joe Aribo from Charlton - they've initiated contact in the last 10 days. The 22-year-old left-footed central midfielder has scored 10 goals in 37 appearances and is on their list as a homegrown squad option.

馬水攻入奠勝既入球


都唔係奠勝既入球

馬列斯無得踢都唔走人：「無得出都好開心」

外界一直盛傳今季嚴重缺乏上陣機會的曼城翼鋒馬列斯會離開球隊，但這名前非洲足球先生就開腔澄清傳聞，稱他即使在球隊得不到很多的上陣機會，也很開心，亦不會離開這支新科英超冠軍球隊。

現年28歲的馬列斯，今季在位置競爭激烈的曼城中未能爭得一席正選之位，僅僅在英超上陣14場，這名阿爾及利亞人就說，就是在後備席上，也是比賽的一部分：「來到一支已經成型的球隊是不容易的，尤其是一支已經能做到一切的球隊，你看看曼城上季的成績。今年是我在球隊的第一年，但我對自己很有信心，對我的能力、技術都很有信心。如果我有落場的機會，我一定可以證明自己，就像對白禮頓的入球，我是能夠幫助球隊的。」


他續道：「我在曼城過得很開心，我並不會因為沒有正選而離開球隊，這只是比賽的一部份，我要繼續強起來，這就是我。」在過去六場比賽中，馬列斯都是坐在後備席廂中，連後備入替的機會也沒有。這名前李城球員今季在英超曾後備上陣12次(正選14次)，攻入六球。但令人印象深刻的，是他在首循環對利物浦時射失關鍵的12碼，令球隊痛失兩分。


下季印馬水了
下季可以試下耶穌頂sane個位

他續道：「我在曼城過得很開心，我並不會因為沒有正選而離開球隊，這只是比賽的一部份，我要繼續強起來，這就是我。」在過去六場比賽中，馬列斯都是坐在後備席廂中，連後備入替的機會也沒有。這名前李城球員今季在英超曾後備上陣12次(正選14次)，攻入六球。但令人印象深刻的，是他在首循環對利物浦時射失關鍵的12碼，令球隊痛失兩分。
